Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers

Class FilmDetailsController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.FilmDetailsController
public class FilmDetailsController extends Object
Controller class for the Film Details screen. This class is responsible for displaying the details of a selected film.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)
